subsection.name: Introduction
subsection.p: This module provides a workflow task which does not run directly when an action is triggered (unlike the module-workflow-notifygru), but allows a daemon to send "GRU" notifications regarding the status of resources and specific date criteria.

subsection.name: Configuration
subsection.p: To configure this task, you must select the data providers and the criteria (status, time) desired to trigger alerts or reminders , and, as for the module-workflow-notifygru, the different types of notification desired.
